name: StaffordTax
0:
”Alexa, ask stafford tax for a fact”
”Alexa, open stafford tax and give me a fact”
”Alexa, launch stafford tax and give me a tax fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stafford tax
des: This is a fact based skill that provides you with tax facts to increase your knowledge of taxation in the United States. Included in this skill are many tax related facts for individuals and business owners. The new tax laws that were enacted in 2018 has brought a lot of attention to the field of tax preparation. This skill includes several of the new updates for 2018.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
